clinical_study.brief_title: Peritoneal Ropivacaine Infiltration on Postoperative Pain in Children Affected
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluate the Analgesic Effect of Intraperitoneal Infiltration of Ropivacaine in Children Undergoing Laparoscopic Surgery

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study was to evaluate the analgesic effect of intraperitoneal infiltration of ropivacaine in children undergoing laparoscopic surgery.

detailed_description.textblock:

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Between 6 months and 5years.
2. Laparoscopic inguinal hernia repair
3. Laparoscopic testicular descent fixation
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Patient who are suffering from mental disease
2. Patient who suffering from neuromuscular disease
3. Local anesthetic allergy
4. Patient who needs directly into ICU after the operation.
